thread.title: French Cafe hailed top NZ restaurant
thread.title_full: French Cafe hailed top NZ restaurant

title: French Cafe hailed top NZ restaurant
text:
French Cafe hailed top NZ restaurant Last updated 19:39, October 14 2015 JASON CREAGHAN / FAIRFAX NZ 
The French Cafe 
Auckland restaurant The French Cafe has been named New Zealand's best restaurant and the 19th best in the world by users of travel website TripAdvisor. 
The Travellers' Choice awards ranks restaurants from around the world based on reviews over the past 12 months. 
The French Cafe was last year listed as the fourth best restaurant in the world in the same awards category. Amanda Midgley 
Chef Simon Wright and manager Creghan Molloy Wright have had their restaurant French Cafe named New Zealand's top by TripAdvisor reviewers. 
It was one of four Auckland restaurants to make the top 10 of New Zealand in this year's awards, alongside the Grove, Depot and Waiheke Island's Mudbrick. 
The top 10 were:
